answers.answer: Scheduled csections are usually due primarily to a medical condition such as:  preeclampsia, justational diabetes, other fetal developmental problems.  If you are experiencing a completly normal pregancy, it would be silly to just schedule a csection, becuase the baby might be too big.  Realistically, the weight of the baby is a guess anyway.  You never know until it comes out.

question: Any one scheduled for a csection? Currently 37weeks 2 days, due May 21 and have a doc appt tomorrow. My doc told me last week, that my baby grew considerably compared to the last measurement 2 weeks prior. I asked him so are you going to schedule me for a csection, he says no we will have you push first and go from there. How do some people end up with a scheduled c section and others not? I would hate to have to push and still get cut.
title: May mommies
